name: Crossybara: Nonogram Slam!
description:
Small-Leaf the Capybara lost the fruit he was going to bring to the hot spring to stack ontop of his head! can you help him scavenge for the lost fruit and save the day? Crossybara: Nonogram Slam! is a new take on the regular Nonogram/Picross puzzle, Instead of solving the puzzle to reveal a picture, you are solving to reveal the level. loads of enjoyable platforming gameplay with a side dish of brain-bamboozling puzzles!

Made in around a week in GMS2 as a fun little side project to make with my brother over winter vacation. The controls are a little fast and the gameplay is a little experimental, But the game is made with a lot of love and I hope you enjoy playing :)

  • 3 Stages of Challenging Puzzles and platforming!
  • 9 Picross Puzzles to solve!
  • 14 fruit to collect!
  • Speedrun timer!
  • Chiptune soundtrack!
Controls:
  • ARROW KEYS - Move player and puzzle crosshair
  • SPACEBAR- Jump  (Hold Spacebar to climb vines)
  • C - Toggle puzzle mode
  • R - Hold to reset puzzle
  • T - Toggle Speedrun timer
  • X - Mark or unmark a tile
  • Z - Fill or empty a tile
  • ESC + Z - Quit game

Controls and information about how picross puzzles work are included on signs at the start of the game. If you would like to play the game purely for the platforming and without the puzzles, Press the red button in the first room as if it was a regular tile.

Notice:

If the game boots up in a very small window, close the program and try booting it up again.
